--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Derek James <blue5432@y...> wrote:
> 
> Philip and I were talking about this as a possible
> approach to a board-game algorithm...a neural net
> agent that scans the board the way your nets scanned
> the grid, then suggests a move. 
> 

I should probably mention I've got such a system implemented
right now in Go.  It's pretty interesting...it plays 5x5
Go at least at a rudimentary level, even though it can't
see the whole board at one time.
